pages.text: Silver is a prominent material in witchcraft, and a symbol of purity.$(br2)It is used as a base for many tools and ingredients that are all very effective against the undead and $(l:bewitchment:creatures/demon)Demons$() of all kinds.
Silver Ore can be found near gold levels.
Silver Ore can be processed in Furnaces and Blast Furnaces.

pages.title: Silver Tools
pages.text: Silver tools are a simple upgrade to Iron tools.$(br)They are crafted using a Smithing Table. While still having most of Iron's qualities, Silver tools inherit abilities from Golden tools.$(br2)They are a great defense against unholy entities, dealing more damage or taking less damage respectively.
silver arrows can be shot just like normal arrows, applying additional damage as silver would.
